Q_DESC: To Substitute the Substring from given String
TESTCASE_1:
This is a test. This is, too.
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
This is a test. This is, too.
Thwas is a test. This is, too.
Thwas was a test. This is, too.
Thwas was a test. Thwas is, too.
Thwas was a test. Thwas was, too.
TESTCASE_2:
This is a fest.
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
This is a fest.
Thwas is a fest.
Thwas was a fest.
